title: Heterogeneous Ozonolysis of Alkyl Substituted- Polycyclic Aromatic Hydrocarbons (AlkPAHs) in the Atmosphere

Polycyclic aromatic compounds (PACs) encompass a range of organic pollutants, including Polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons (PAHs), alkyl-substituted PAHs (AlkPAHs), and others. PAHs have been extensively studied due to their environmental and...
